title: I Was A Punk Before You Were A Punk
description: This book picks up where Mosquitoes & Whisky left off, in 1977, on the day Elvis died. In I Was a Punk Before You Were a Punk, the author joins the fledgling Hardcore movement and jumps headlong into the punk lifestyle. Detailing the early exploits of punk legends such as Personality Crisis, the Stretch Marks and the Unwanted, I Was a Punk Before You Were a Punk is a riotous account of early hardcore on the prairies. Includes 14 pages of classic photos.
author: Chris Walter
